solution_line_template: The number of vets that recommend Puppy Kibble is {total_vets}*{puppy_kibble_percent_decimal}=<<{total_vets}*{puppy_kibble_percent_decimal}={vets_puppy_kibble}>>{vets_puppy_kibble}.
The number of vets that recommend Yummy Dog Kibble is {total_vets}*{yummy_kibble_percent_decimal}=<<{total_vets}*{yummy_kibble_percent_decimal}={vets_yummy_kibble}>>{vets_yummy_kibble} vets.

Thus, {vets_yummy_kibble}-{vets_puppy_kibble}=<<{vets_yummy_kibble}-{vets_puppy_kibble}={difference_in_recommendations}>>{difference_in_recommendations} more vets recommend Yummy Dog Kibble than Puppy Kibble.
